pr_title: fix(TDI-44051):add the real value to the db name

timeline.message: fix(TDI-44051):add the real value to the db name

timeline.bodyText: is dynamicField_<%=cid%>.getProp("talend.field.dbColumnName") possible to be null? (in some components)
timeline.author: jzhao-talend

replies.bodyText: Yes. It supposes to be null in other components. Since I search the code, it seems no other component is using this variable "DBName".
replies.author: pyzhou-talend

replies.bodyText:
consider what we have done before. mayben  keep set it to dynamicField_<%=cid%>.name()
when dynamicField_<%=cid%>.getProp("talend.field.dbColumnName") is null.
we can't guarantee customer don't have custom code to handle dynamic.
replies.author: jzhao-talend

timeline.message: set dbName as name when db column is null
